lead_paragraph: Skateboarding icon Tony Hawk thinks his sport will give the Olympics a big lift if it's added to the 2020 Tokyo Games.

headline.print_headline: Skateboarding Star Tony Hawk: Olympics 'Need Our Excitement'
headline.main: Skateboarding Star Tony Hawk: Olympics 'Need Our Excitement'
